amendment.description: Amendment provides funding for the Small Business Administration's microloan program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to restore funding for the Small Business Administration's "micro-loan" technology and loan program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wolf amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Wolf.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wolf amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
